::Ramulus/Zardus::

Ramulus walks into the leaders' meeting, seconds too late to hear Zardus' 
comment to Liono.

Zardus spins around as he hears footsteps behind him, aiming his gun but then 
relaxing when he sees Ramulus and assumes he is Liono's escort.. He turns 
back to Liono, waiting for the maximal leader to answer his last question.
